statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score < 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, satisfaction_score ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT customer_id, MAX(satisfaction_score) AS highest_satisfaction FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 2
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_score < 2;
SELECT feedback_id AS ID, feedback_text AS Feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_score < 2 ORDER BY customer_id, satisfaction_score;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, score FROM CustomerFeedback CF INNER JOIN CustomerScores CS ON CF.feedback_id = CS.feedback_id WHERE score > 8 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(score) AS total_scores FROM CustomerFeedback CF LEFT JOIN CustomerScores CS ON CF.feedback_id = CS.feedback_id GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING total_scores > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customers INNER JOIN satisfaction_scores ON customers.customer_id = satisfaction_scores.feedback_id WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, f.feedback_text, s.satisfaction_score FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id JOIN satisfaction_scores s ON f.feedback_id = s.feedback_id WHERE s.satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_score, customer_id FROM feedbacks WHERE satisfaction_score <= 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 20;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE survey_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM feedbacks ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE customer_id = 2 AND survey_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT AVG(score_value) AS average_score FROM scores WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM feedbacks WHERE satisfaction_score > 2);
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, score_value FROM customer INNER JOIN satisfaction_scores ON customer.customer_id = satisfaction_scores.customer_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_summary JOIN feedback_categories ON feedback_summary.category_id = feedback_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
